title: [Large-Scale] Advanced Training on Augmented Reality-Based Operational Amplifiers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic electronics principles, circuit analysis techniques, and understanding of operational amplifier fundamentals
context.additional_context: Job competency enhancement program for pre-service and in-service teachers. Blended learning environment centered on experiments using digital devices (smartphones).

learning_goals: Learners can observe input-output signal changes in operational amplifier circuits in real-time using AR technology
Learners can accurately describe internal components and signal pathways of operational amplifiers through 3D model manipulation
Learners can derive output voltage calculation formulas in various circuit configurations and compare them with experimental values.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
